giveRightToVote(address).details: Give 'voter' the right to vote on this ballot. May only be called by 'chairperson'.

vote(uint256).details: Give your vote (including votes delegated to you) to candidate 'candidates[candidate].name'.

params.candidate: index of candidate in the candidates array
